'Hercules' is a city in western Contra Costa County, California. Situated along
the coast of San Pablo Bay, it is located in the eastern region of the San
Francisco Bay Area, about north of Berkeley. Hercules has a 2010 population of
24,060 according to the U.S. Census. Old Town Pinole serves as the city's
original commercial center.
